src:
Pensiun dari Sepak Bola, Seperti Ini Aktivitas Santuy Ala Ronaldinho
04 Nov 2019, 05:29 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Legenda sepak bola Brasil, Ronaldinho, sudah pensiun akan tetapi kegiatannya pasca berhenti bermain bola masih menarik untuk diamati.
Ronaldinho mengawali karirnya di klub Gremio di Brasil pada tahun 1998 silam. Pada usia 18 tahun, Ronaldinho langsung menembus tim senior klub.
Kariernya terus menanjak kala merumput bersama Barcelona. Ia sempat pula bermain di klub seperti PSG dan AC Milan.
Pria berusia 39 tahun itu pensiun bermain bola pada Januari 2018 lalu. Setelah itu ia sempat memamerkan sejumlah kesibukannya pasca gantung sepatu.
Ronaldinho berencana membentuk tim eSport. Ia memang menjadi salah satu pencinta olahraga eletronik tersebut.



Ronaldinho berencana membuat sebuah tim eSport bergenre sepak bola. Nantinya, tim besutannya bisa turut serta dalam setiap agenda yang diadakan FIFA dan PES.
Ronaldinho juga sudah memiliki nama yang cocok untuk calon tim eSportnya itu, yakni "R10". Selain sedang mempersiapkan tim eSport besutannya, Ronaldinho juga menjalani masa pensiunnya dengan sangat santai.
Disadur dari Bola.com, berikut sederet aktivitas santuy Ronaldinho setelah memutuskan pensiun dari dunia sepak bola.
text:
Retiring from Football, Like This Santuy Ala Ronaldinho's Activity
Nov 04 2019, 05:29 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Brazilian soccer legend Ronaldinho has retired but his activities after quitting playing football are still interesting to watch.
Ronaldinho began his career at the Gremio club in Brazil in 1998. At the age of 18, Ronaldinho immediately broke into the club's senior team.
His career continued to climb when grazing with Barcelona. He also played at clubs such as PSG and AC Milan.
The 39-year-old retired playing football in January 2018. After that he had exhibited a number of his busy life after hanging up his boots.
Ronaldinho plans to form an eSport team. He has indeed become one of those lovers of electronic sports.



Ronaldinho plans to create a football genre eSport team. Later, his team can participate in every agenda held by FIFA and PES.
Ronaldinho also has a suitable name for the prospective eSport team, namely "R10". Aside from preparing for his eSport team, Ronaldinho also has a very relaxed retirement.
Adapted from Bola.com, following a series of Ronaldinho's activities after deciding to retire from the world of football.
